channel.title: Dragon Claws Hit Wered
channel.description: Sorry For Keep Posting lol thanks for help on drag claws but also i hit like i punch how i change to anim 2068? plz help thanks :)

item.title: Dragon Claws Hit Wered
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

In your client class, search -

public int GetWepAnim(int id)

You should see this -

public int GetWepAnim(int id) { if(id == -1) // unarmed { return 422; } if(id == 837) { return 1084; } if(id == 3190 || id == 3192 || id == 3194 || id == 3196 || id == 3198 || id== 3200 || id == 3202 || id == 3204) // halberds { return 440; } if(id == 4170 || id == 4675) { return 414; } if(id == 4151) // whip { return 1658; }

Make it this -

public int GetWepAnim(int id) { if(id == DCLAW ID) //dclaws { return 2068; } if(id == -1) // unarmed { return 422; } if(id == 837) { return 1084; } if(id == 3190 || id == 3192 || id == 3194 || id == 3196 || id == 3198 || id== 3200 || id == 3202 || id == 3204) // halberds { return 440; } if(id == 4170 || id == 4675) { return 414; } if(id == 4151) // whip { return 1658; }

Read full topic
